r.s: APM and distributed tracing for PHP
r.d: The Datadog PHP Tracer brings APM and distributed tracing to PHP.
r.n:
### Added - Optional extension .so files compiled with "-g" flag #306 - Log backtrace on segmentation fault, enabled via ddtrace.log_backtrace=1 #300
### Fixed - Auto-instrumentation when user's autoloader throws exception on not found #305
